    • update

      @Transactional public Customer update(Customer customer) throws InvalidCustomerParameterException, CustomerNotFoundException
      Updates the information of an existing customer in the database.
      Specified by:
      update in interface CustomerService
      Parameters:
      customer - The Customer object containing the updated information.
      Returns:
      The updated Customer object.
      Throws:
      InvalidCustomerParameterException - If the customer ID is empty or if the customer name is empty.
      CustomerNotFoundException - If the customer with the given ID is not found.

    • findByParams

      public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Customer> findByParams(String name, String email, String phone, org.springframework.data.domain.PageRequest paging)
      Retrieves a page of customers based on provided parameters.
      Specified by:
      findByParams in interface CustomerService
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the customer (optional).
      email - The email of the customer (optional).
      phone - The phone number of the customer (optional).
      paging - The pagination information.
      Returns:
      A Page of Customer objects that match the provided parameters.
